kneeling by my bed.

beautiful pictures of them.

Those first experiences really left a mark on me.
My name is Chris Cook.

Around 600 BC during the time of Jeremiah the biblical

Lehi's sons populated the line and communicated with God from
time to time.
Mormon was one of the last descendants of these people.

which is called paradise, a state of rest, a state of

When I read that, those words, I felt the Spirit.

Where I'm from in Jamaica, it's very superstitious place.
